weather_report:
As the dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a delicate veil of marine fog drapes the city, hinting at its characteristic charm. The forecast presents a tantalizing blend of weather, with the promise of mostly sunny skies later in the day. For now, a light drizzle may whisper to the unsuspecting passerby, which is expected to dissipate by mid-morning. The gentle west-southwest winds rustle through the streets, adding a brisk energy to the air. With temperatures hovering around the mid-sixties, an inviting chill lingers, suggesting layers might be your trusty companion today.

As the day progresses, the city will gradually unveil its warm hues, inviting you to stroll along the Embarcadero or savor a quiet moment in one of the many parks. A light jacket, perhaps, will keep you comfortable against the winds, while sensible footwear will prepare you for any spontaneous explorations. Consider soaking in the splendid sights of the bay, embracing the tranquility before the sun claims its rightful place in the afternoon sky. Whether you choose to linger at an outdoor café or venture towards the local shops, the emerging clarity and slight warmth will provide the perfect backdrop for a leisurely day.
